price: Enti (Nkͻmhyεni), si aboterε. Nokorε sε Nyankopͻn bͻhyε no yε nokorε; na εmma wͻn a wͻn adwen nnsi wͻn pie no mmͻ wo ngu anaasε wͻmmu w’aba mu.
arabic: فَٱصۡبِرۡ إِنَّ وَعۡدَ ٱللَّهِ حَقّٞۖ وَلَا يَسۡتَخِفَّنَّكَ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يُوقِنُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: fa-iṣ'bir inna waʿda al-lahi ḥaqqun walā yastakhiffannaka alladhīna lā yūqinūna
